channel.title: ViperQuidex, the Auxy Drum and Bass collective
channel.description:
THE RELEASE OF VIPERQUIDEX, THE DRUM AND BASS COLLECTIVE
*Who are we and what is ViperQuidex?*
We are Twizard and Hexx, ViperQuidex is an only drum and bass collective.
*What do we want to achieve with the collective?*
There are not much drum and bass producers and most of them are pretty unknown, and they deserve way more exposure. We want to help them get exposure with this collective, so they get what they deserve
*How can I submit songs?*
if you want to submit your song, you can either DM us on discord
(tom heck#5828 or Twizard#4682) or you can email us ([viperquidex@gmail.com](mailto:viperquidex@gmail.com)).
You can also submit your songs on Google Form here:
[docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLâ€¦97871213462724457](https://gate.sc/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.google.com%2Fforms%2Fd%2Fe%2F1FAIpQLSdxVtjJlQNqs12ruguE6aYNxphlQ-dZhRfqPy2BAxcu82k0qQ%2Fviewform%3Ffbzx%3D2697871213462724457&token=93237b-1-1577304136235)
Please note: we donâ€™t post all the songs everyone sends, if your song doesnâ€™t get posted, donâ€™t worry, there are always more chancesðŸ˜‰
Our SoundCloud account: https://soundcloud.com/viperquidex
Our discord server: https://discord.gg/xB7mGv5
Thereâ€™ll be probably some questions about people saying there are already tons of collectives. But, this collective is unique, just like any other collective. For example: The Auxy Collective focuses on megacollabs, Nosun focuses on heavy songs, Melo on chill songs, and we, we focus on Drum and Bass songs
Twizard and Hexx
Our first release: https://soundcloud.com/viperquidex/cryptology

Who are we and what is ViperQuidex?

We are Twizard and Hexx, ViperQuidex is an only drum and bass collective.

What do we want to achieve with the collective?

There are not much drum and bass producers and most of them are pretty unknown, and they deserve way more exposure. We want to help them get exposure with this collective, so they get what they deserve
